alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 2:19AM PST until March 07 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes Highways 101 and 154, as well as the Gaviota and San Marcos Passes. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds may become localized later this morning and early this afternoon, but winds will strengthen again late this afternoon through late tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
